subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: James Blake had endured four grueling matches, finally succumbing in the fourth round in a five-set duel with Tommy Haas, 4-6, 6-4, 3-6, 6-0, 7-6 (4).
snippet: James Blake had endured four grueling matches, finally succumbing in the fourth round in a five-set duel with Tommy Haas, 4-6, 6-4, 3-6, 6-0, 7-6 (4).
